words.def: cloak that is folded or wrapped around a person
A blow or beating; a whap.
a clawed foot of an animal especially a quadruped
the waging of armed conflict against an enemy
(golf) the standard number of strokes set for each hole on a golf course, or for the entire course
a reproach for some lapse or misdeed
an informal term for a father
a colorless and odorless inert gas
